Public Attributes

ULONG baseAddr

Detailed Description

Info about the device used for the read or write operation. DMA parameters to program into channel and BDs to perform the operation.

Definition at line 118 of file lscdma.h.

ULONG DevMemParams_t::addrMode
 

0=FIFO, 1=linear, 2=loop
